languages.text: "Тогда бы по трубам пустили кислоту или яд. Есть более простые способы убить человека, чем утопить его в крови, пусть и грязной".
"Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."
languages.original_text: "Тогда бы по трубам пустили кислоту или яд. Есть более простые способы убить человека, чем утопить его в крови, пусть и грязной".

traits.locale_text: "They would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, albeit one that is foul."
"They would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, albeit one that is foul."
"Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, albeit messy ones."
"Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, albeit messy ones."
"Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."
"Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

languages.text: «En ese caso, habrían vertido veneno o ácido en el agua. Hay formas más sencillas de matar a una persona que ahogándola en sangre, por sucia que sea».
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, habrían vertido veneno o ácido en el agua. Hay formas más sencillas de matar a una persona que ahogándola en sangre, por sucia que sea».

languages.text: 「そして、彼らは酸か毒を、代わりに風呂に満たしたことでしょう。その血は汚れているかもしれませんが、血で溺れさせるよりも簡単な殺し方があります」
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、彼らは酸か毒を、代わりに風呂に満たしたことでしょう。その血は汚れているかもしれませんが、血で溺れさせるよりも簡単な殺し方があります」

languages.text: “如果对方真的有这个打算，那他们应该把浴缸里装满酸液或毒药才对。尽管那些血很肮脏，但把人淹死在血里并不是最有效的暗杀手段。”
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

traits.locale_text: “如果对方真的有这个打算，那他们应该把浴缸里装满酸液或毒药才对。尽管那些血很肮脏，但把人淹死在血里并不是最有效的暗杀手段。”

languages.text: "Dann hätten sie das Bad mit Säure oder Gift gefüllt. Es gibt einfachere Wege, jemanden zu töten, als ihn in Blut zu ertränken, so verrottet dieses Blut auch sein mag."
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

traits.locale_text: "Dann hätten sie das Bad mit Säure oder Gift gefüllt. Es gibt einfachere Wege, jemanden zu töten, als ihn in Blut zu ertränken, so verrottet dieses Blut auch sein mag."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, ils auraient rempli la baignoire d'acide ou de poison. Il y a des moyens bien plus simples de tuer quelqu'un que de le noyer dans le sang, aussi fétide soit-il. »
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, ils auraient rempli la baignoire d'acide ou de poison. Il y a des moyens bien plus simples de tuer quelqu'un que de le noyer dans le sang, aussi fétide soit-il. »

languages.text: "Öyle olsa banyoyu asitle veya zehirle doldururlardı. Kan ne kadar kirli olursa olsun, onun içinde boğmaktan daha kolay öldürme yöntemleri vardır."
languages.original_text: "Then they would have filled the bath with acid or poison instead. There are easier ways to kill someone than drowning them in blood, as foul as that blood may be."
